text: This my second time engaged their services for mosquito magnetic net for my room and for my first net last me for about 11 years which good pretty a long enough. Happy with their service! Fast responds with excellent work! They are very reliable company. Will definitely engaged  them now and future.

The services provided were prompt.
The staff who took the measurement took time to explain in detail what the final product will be.
The office staff was prompt to response to my request, and
the staff who  installed took time to show me how to operate the netting too.
Overall, I am a satified customer and happy to recommend them to my family & friends who need netting against mosquitoes,  cockcroahes and lizards üòÅ.

Found this company in the www.  The reviews were decent and decided to engage them as their pricing was reasonable.

They were very prompt in their after service as one of window panes could not open, the service agent came the day after to rectify the screen.

They did a great job of advising me on suitable options based on my needs during the on-site assessment, and I especially appreciated how they were looking to give best value for money rather than just proposing the most expensive option. The installation was done really quickly and the staff were very punctual too. Can highly recommend for anyone looking for insect or cat proofing options for their homes!

Went to a few places to find cat proof magnetic shades. Found Magnetic screen able to provide cat proof solution. Mr See was assigned to me to handle my project. He is very patient. He came down a few times to take down measurements bcoz I decided to changed all my windows, thus need to do remeasurement for me again. Feel very pai seh. No extra costing.
